channel.title: Vps
channel.description:
Okay guys, I want to purchase a VPS but I honestly have no idea how it works.
1. Can anyone recommend a cheap but decent VPS hoster? 2. How do they run your server, is there anything server sided you need to add?
Sorry if the questions seem stupid, but this is honestly the first time I have even attempted this.

item.title: Vps
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:2, topic:341015”]vpsland.com has cheep VPS’s

also you can read here for more info

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,429240.40.html[/quote]

After using Vpsland several times, I think frantech are 5x better, there 512mb one is only $12 and is better than anything I’ve had on vpsland.

Read full topic
